mapper.select: select C.commu_no as commuNo, crp.crp_no as crpNo, re.regdate as regDate, re.content as content, me.nick as writerNick, mere.nick reciverNick from commu C left join crp crp on C.commu_no = crp.crp_no left join reply re on crp.reply_no = re.reply_no left join member me on re.member_no = me.member_no left join member mere on re.reply_reciver = mere.member_no where commu_no = #{commuNo};

select MB.mb_no as mbNo, mr.mr_no as mrNo, re.regdate as regDate, re.content as content, me.nick as writerNick, mere.nick reciverNick from mb mb left join mr mr on MB.mb_no = mr.mr_no left join reply re on mr.reply_no = re.reply_no left join member me on re.member_no = me.member_no left join member mere on re.reply_reciver = mere.member_no where mb_no = #{mbNo};
